DOCNAME: IVAN AND MARTIN MEDIC v. CROATIA
JUDGES: Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicants , Mr PERSON and Mr PERSON , are NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in DATE . They are represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in Split . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) are represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicants brought a civil action against an insurance company in ORG ( PERSON ) , seeking damages in connection with a road accident .

In the period before the entry into force of the LAW in respect of GPE ( DATE ) , a judgment was twice adopted and both times quashed by the appellate court . The case was transferred to ORG ( PERSON u ORG ) .

Further hearings before the court of first instance were held on CARDINAL DATE and DATE , and DATE , DATE , CARDINAL May and DATE , when a fresh judgment was adopted . However , on DATE the judgment was quashed by ORG ( PERSON ) and the case was remitted to the court of first instance .
Hearings were held on DATE and DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE and DATE , when a judgment on the merits was adopted . It was quashed by the appellate court on DATE .
A further hearing was held on DATE .

Meanwhile , on DATE the applicants brought a constitutional complaint about the length of the proceedings . On DATE ORG found a violation of the applicants’ right to a hearing within a reasonable time . It awarded each applicant CARDINAL NORP kunas ( HRK ) in compensation , and also ordered ORG to decide the case in the shortest time possible but DATE after the publication of the decision of ORG in ORG .
On DATE the ORG gave a judgment . On DATE it gave an additional judgment on the part of the claim which had not been addressed in the judgment of CARDINAL DATE .

On DATE the ORG upheld both judgments in parts concerning the main claim , but quashed the part concerning the interest rate and the costs of proceedings and remitted it to the first instance . The proceedings in that respect are still pending .
